title: In a Chinese Garden
description: The book In a Chinese Garden introduces students to the features of a Chinese garden and the Chinese characters that represent some of the objects in it. Repetitive phrases, supportive pictures, and high-frequency words make this book a good choice for emerging readers.
meta: Chinese, garden, glad, mirror, stand, strong
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant sound /w/
Foreign Vocabulary : Identify the meaning of Chinese characters

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
